quote: Stay close... keep your head    low.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: No matter what happens, one of us    has got to get that generator.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Come on!
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Jake!
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Medkit...
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Over there...
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Now.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Hypo...
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Sit me up.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Do it. I'm not going to die with    my face in the dirt.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: (getting a grip on     himself)   Okay...
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: How's your head?
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Hurts.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: You're lucky I didn't kill you -    thought you were a Klingon. Have    you seen any?
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: What?
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Klingons -- are there any patrols    around?
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: What about Starfleet?
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: No one.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Just you and me then.        What the hell are you doing out    here? Why'd you leave the    settlement?
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: I was outside when the shelling    started. I guess I got lost    trying to find cover.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Lucky me. I could use the    company.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Here... water.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: What about you?
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Go ahead.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Thanks.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: It probably would've leaked out of    me anyway...
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Don't let me fall over. I want to    go out looking up at the sky, not    the ground, all right?
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Don't worry.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: You didn't see a crashed hopper    around here, did you?
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: No.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: They made it.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Who?
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: My platoon. The Klingons had us    pinned down. We couldn't beam out    because they had a transport    scrambler running... so we called    for a hopper. As soon as it set    down, the Klingons came at us.    Our C.O. ordered me and Brice to    lay down cover so the squad could    get up the ramp.    (shaking his head as he    remembers)   By the time Brice got in, the   Klingons were practically on top   of us. The hopper was taking such   a pounding, I didn't think it   would make it off the ground.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: You stayed behind on purpose, so    they could get away.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: The hypo... where is it?
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: It's empty...
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Figures...
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: I'm going to get you out of here.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: I'll make a stretcher...
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: With what?
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Then I'll carry you.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Kid, you try picking me up, and my    guts'll wind up all over your    shoes.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: But I've got to do something, I've    got to try.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Forget it.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: But I have to. That way this'll    all make sense. I ran for a    reason -- so I could find you and    bring you back and save your life.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Ran -- ?
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: From the explosions -- we had to    get to the runabout, for the    generator, but then the shelling    started and I couldn't see Doctor    Bashir and the explosions kept    getting closer and I had to get    out of there so I ran, I ran and    I kept running until I found you.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: The doctor -- you left him.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: It was a mistake.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: That's what you call it.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: I didn't mean for it to happen.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: And now you think that bringing me    back is going to make everything    all right.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Sorry, kid.       Life doesn't work that way.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Benjamin --
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Be right out...
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: What've you been doing in there    for three hours?
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Oh, I was just tweaking the    pattern buffers in the replicator    systems.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Great, I always thought the coffee    could be a little hotter.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Just trying to keep busy.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Is it helping?
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Not really.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: I wish there was something I could    do, some way I could promise you    that everything is going to be    okay.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: But you can't. No one can.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: I know what it's like to worry    about a child. Raifi put Tobin    through hell -- and when Neema was    six, she came down with Regulan    fever. Audrid spent two weeks in    the hospital with her, never left    her side. It was hundreds of    years ago, and I still remember    how helpless I felt. I read her    all seventeen volumes of Caster's    Down the River Light, even though    I knew she couldn't hear me. It    made me feel like I was doing    something, that we were still    connected. It wasn't until much    later that I realized I was doing    it as much for me as for her.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: To keep busy.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: So how did it turn out, with    Neema?
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: She pulled through.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: I was hoping you were going to say    that. If that story had an    unhappy ending, I never would've    forgiven you.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Of course, by the time she was    twenty-one, Neema wouldn't even    speak to me.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: For how long?
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: About eight years.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Do me a favor, tell me about it    some other time. Right now, all    I care about is seeing Jake again.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: You will -- tomorrow, when we get    to Ajilon Prime.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: You know, Ben... coffee can never    be too hot. Are you sure you got    the Replicator buffers synchronized?
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: You want to check for yourself?
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: I think I will. Can I borrow your    decoupler?
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Get your own. I'm going to go    check the sonic shower relays.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Good idea.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Jake!
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: We thought you were... this is    great.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: What happened?
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: I got knocked out when we were    trying to get to the runabout.    Did Doctor Bashir make it back all    right?
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: He's in IC for the night, plasma    burns on his arm and shoulder. I    don't know how he managed it, but    he carried the generator back here    by himself.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: We went looking for you when the    shelling stopped. There was    hardly anything left of the    runabout... the whole place was    nothing but bomb craters and    smoke. We pretty much gave up    hope.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: I must've wandered off in the    wrong direction when I came to.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: You're lucky you didn't get picked    up by the Klingons. Word is,    they're massing to attack the    compound.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: You want to see him?
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: I should probably let him rest.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: He's awake, I was just in there.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Go ahead, he'll be glad to see    you're okay.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Jake... ?
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Thank God...
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: I thought you'd been killed. Once    the shelling stopped and I    couldn't find you, I assumed the    worst.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: I'm sorry.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: It's all right.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: No, it's not. I never should've    brought you here in the first place.        Now we're stuck here, the Klingons    are massing to attack -- what was    I thinking!
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Forget it, okay! What's done is    done.

quote: I couldn't stand hearing him    apologize to me like that... not    after what I'd done...

quote: All right, you two, visiting hours    re over.       Let me have a look at that.

quote: I keep turning it over in my   head...
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: The shelling, losing sight of    Bashir, running... and I keep    trying to make sense of it all, to   justify what I did. But when it    comes down to it, there's only one    explanation. I'm a coward.

episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Part of me wishes Bashir had seen    me run away and told everyone the    truth. They deserve to know what    I am... they should know they    can't count on me... that if the    Klingons attack, I'll run and hide    just like I did before...

episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: You've got to have good aim... and    no matter what else you can say    about me, you can't say I don't    have good aim.

quote: If I hadn't hit my foot just    right, I would've taken my whole    leg off.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: It's funny... one minute your    life's moving along just the way    you always figured it would, the    next... you do something that    changes everything, that makes you   realize you're not who you thought    you were.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: At the Academy, I did really well    in the battle simulations - never   had any problems -- but when    you're out there, live shells    detonating all around you, it's a    whole different thing.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: All you can think about is getting    away from the explosions...
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Yeah. That's pretty much it.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: You know something... you're    first person I've talked to since    I got here who hasn't made me feel    like I'm taking up valuable bed    space.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: The way everyone looks at me... I    can't stand it. After the court    martial, I'm going to sign up for    the next mining expedition to the    Gamma Quadrant.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Maybe there won't be a court    martial.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: You're right, none of us may get    out of here alive.

quote: I just wish I'd aimed that phaser    a little higher...

scene: 49   INT. CAVERN - STAFF BUNK ROOM - DAY
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Don't be so sure about that. Some    people think it's like being    boiled alive.

episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Your brain doesn't die for five,    ten seconds at least...
scene: 49   INT. CAVERN - STAFF BUNK ROOM - DAY
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: In theory, your headless corpse    could be the last thing you see.
scene: 49   INT. CAVERN - STAFF BUNK ROOM - DAY
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: You're so negative.

episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: I'm just telling you what I've    heard.
scene: 49   INT. CAVERN - STAFF BUNK ROOM - DAY
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: What do you think, Jake?

episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: I think it's not funny.
scene: 49   INT. CAVERN - STAFF BUNK ROOM - DAY
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Cut it out!
scene: 49   INT. CAVERN - STAFF BUNK ROOM - DAY
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

scene: 49   INT. CAVERN - STAFF BUNK ROOM - DAY
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: I was just kidding.
scene: 49   INT. CAVERN - STAFF BUNK ROOM - DAY
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: It's all so stupid. This whole    stupid war is such a waste. In    ten years, no one's going to    remember what anyone did here.

quote: What happened?
scene: 78   INT. CAVERN - MAIN WARD - JAKES POV
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

scene: 78   INT. CAVERN - MAIN WARD - JAKES POV
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: The cease-fire has been    reinstated. The Klingons are    pulling out. It's over.
scene: 78   INT. CAVERN - MAIN WARD - JAKES POV
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Admittedly, the timing could have    been a little better, but...
scene: 78   INT. CAVERN - MAIN WARD - JAKES POV
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: He seems to be all right.
scene: 78   INT. CAVERN - MAIN WARD - JAKES POV
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Sealing the entrance way was a    risky thing to do. You almost    brought the whole ceiling down on    yourself.
scene: 78   INT. CAVERN - MAIN WARD - JAKES POV
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Still, we never would've gotten    all the patients out if he hadn't    done it.        You're a hero.
scene: 78   INT. CAVERN - MAIN WARD - JAKES POV
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: More than anything, I wanted to    believe what he was saying...
scene: 78   INT. CAVERN - MAIN WARD - JAKES POV
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: But the truth is, I was just as    scared in that hospital as I'd    been when we went for the    generator...
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: (continuing   So scared, that all I could think    about was doing whatever it took    to stay alive...
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Once that meant running away, and    once it meant picking up a    phaser...
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: The battle of Ajilon Prime will   probably be remembered as a   pointless skirmish, but I'll   always remember it as something   more -- as the place I learned   that the line between courage and   cowardice is a lot thinner than   most people believe...
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: So what do you think... ?
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: Anyone who's been in battle would    recognize himself in this... but    most of us wouldn't care to admit    it.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: It takes courage to look inside    yourself... and even more courage    to write about it for other people   to see.
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong

quote: I'm proud of you, son...
episode: ... Nor the Battle to the Strong
